reviewtext: I was worried about purchasing this older model of the Canon Flashes since i didn't know if it was compatible with newer rebel DSLR cameras. After researching and getting nothing on google i took a leap of faith and walla! It works wonderful with my Rebel T3! Its sturdy and works wonderful. I just thought i'd write a review on this flash and the compatibility in case there is someone else like me wondering.
summary: Great Flash for my Rebel T3 DSLR
